title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When creating report parameters and setting default values for them, the default values are not displayed in the Show Report Parameters' dialog.
OB: When opening the Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters are not shown.
EB: When opening the Show Report Parameters' dialog, the default values for the report parameters should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create several report parameters. 
2. Set default values for the report parameters. 
3. Drag the report parameters to the layout. 
4. Open the Show Report Parameters' dialog and observe that the default values are not shown.
